name: Side Plank Under Reach
instruction: Start in a side plank position, with your right shoulder over your elbow, your body in a straight line, and reach your left hand toward the ceiling. Twist your torso forward and slowly place your left arm under your body. Repeat and then switch sides.
hints: When doing the side plank rotation, engage your core, tighten your abs and maintain your body in a straight line. Keep your feet stacked, maintain your elbow under your shoulder, and breathe out as you slowly twist your torso and tuck your hand under your body.
